text: Nihsandeha kkaruna chila musara sbajatidera madhyekara, kintu se tamdera birud'dhe bidroha karala. Ara amara take dhanabhandarera etasaba diyechilama ye tara cabigulo ekadala balabana lokera bojha haye yeta. Dekho! Tara lokera take balale -- ''garba karo na, nihsandeha allah dambhikadera bhalabasena na.
